column5: Mid-century modern house convenient to down town Dallas, the Dallas Arboretum, White Rock Lake and Harry Stone Park. The house is 15 minutes from down town in an eclectic neighborhood surrounded by big trees and mid-century houses. White Rock Lake is a mile with over 10 miles of hike/bike trials. The house is quickly accessible from I-30 and can have you in down town Dallas, Deep Ellum, the Arts/Museum District and the American Airlines Center (Dallas Stars and Dallas Maverics) in no time.
column8: Remodeled Mid-Century Near Downtown Business Ready
